
Two friends used RSA to send secrets, unknowingly sharing a prime. Can you exploit their mistake to recover the message? Ciphertext: 555301669473510296323098924272469457454907371752031986657154079191092992313025974651822839319099677532601893380328516035069386693425346733355117414281917387254873446195438577591244977970121493786827185399586147524024094762156194192


The flag format is flag{...}
n=816697400977694651016709059210446085650471321399806091523644353300634611548907786272388714872682349833035852373325883217635718172072124003926451686210961227501688818002501614029400749471425368980292889121381549306778892766742910879, n2=741760518860183780484128884925610283284775032615007137191365524291498399601279474005726243659007645678241028142062553699537930385929807871155493051013815708678465899068881325089783627621145239986312733687235189458654285466941536943, e=570451404892387775191766723525565486322431988594874358828365063172212274891379094815457492697216755518352302833804543573223353534409904301038612452086181819113051902141613965036493779940037228900618839624428366155318289645960603479

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{hjt6vfmo}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 555301669473510296323098924272469457454907371752031986657154079191092992313025974651822839319099677532601893380328516035069386693425346733355117414281917387254873446195438577591244977970121493786827185399586147524024094762156194192
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=816697400977694651016709059210446085650471321399806091523644353300634611548907786272388714872682349833035852373325883217635718172072124003926451686210961227501688818002501614029400749471425368980292889121381549306778892766742910879, n2=741760518860183780484128884925610283284775032615007137191365524291498399601279474005726243659007645678241028142062553699537930385929807871155493051013815708678465899068881325089783627621145239986312733687235189458654285466941536943, e=570451404892387775191766723525565486322431988594874358828365063172212274891379094815457492697216755518352302833804543573223353534409904301038612452086181819113051902141613965036493779940037228900618839624428366155318289645960603479
extra_info: p=23735306123601915965526435142052508129918795247347886207315639138285398745786085103205704023378669370118807626757313, q=34408547196515279471736209201398103389575783315214983897376677261883317580875541109965816828033441524682821422220383, q2=31251356734033941320806102180101599327562339347562782811879505539988717045482804921319202364743366143643886593350511, φ(n)=816697400977694651016709059210446085650471321399806091523644353300634611548907786272388714872682349833035852373325825073782398054876686741282108235599441732923126255132396921713000580755098707354079717600530137195884091137693933184, φ(n2)=741760518860183780484128884925610283284775032615007137191365524291498399601279474005726243659007645678241028142062498712875072750072521538618170896906358227543870988399862129945105353505353971096288208780847067423140522772721429120
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
